00027    /*
00028    * Constructor.
00029    */
00030    ComMSD::ComMSD(System& system) 
00031     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00032       outputFile_(),
00033       accumulator_(),
00034       truePositions_(),
00035       oldPositions_(),
00036       shifts_(),
00037       speciesId_(-1),
00038       nMolecule_(-1),
00039       nAtom_(-1),
00040       capacity_(-1),
00041       isInitialized_(false)
00042    {}
00043 
00044    /*
00045    * Read parameters from file, and allocate data array.
00046    */
00047    void ComMSD::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00048    {
00049       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00050       readInterval(in);
00051       readOutputFileName(in);
00052       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00053       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00054 
00055       // Validate parameters
00056       if (speciesId_ < 0)       UTIL_THROW("Negative speciesId");
00057       if (speciesId_ >= system().simulation().nSpecies()) 
00058                                 UTIL_THROW("speciesId > nSpecies");
00059       if (capacity_ <= 0)       UTIL_THROW("Negative capacity");
00060 
00061       // Maximum possible number of molecules of this species
00062       int speciesCapacity;
00063       speciesCapacity = system().simulation().species(speciesId_).capacity();
00064 
00065       // Allocate local arrays
00066       truePositions_.allocate(speciesCapacity);
00067       oldPositions_.allocate(speciesCapacity);
00068       shifts_.allocate(speciesCapacity);
00069 
00070       // Allocate memory for the AutoCorrArray accumulator
00071       accumulator_.setParam(speciesCapacity, capacity_);
00072 
00073       // Get number of atoms per molecule.
00074       nAtom_ = system().simulation().species(speciesId_).nAtom();
00075 
00076       isInitialized_ = true;
00077    }
00078 
00079    /*
00080    * Set number of molecules and initialize state.
00081    */
00082    void ComMSD::setup() 
00083    {
00084 
00085       // Precondition: Confirm that readParam was called
00086       if (!isInitialized_)
00087          UTIL_THROW("Diagnostic not initialized");
00088 
00089       // Get number of molecules of this species in this System. 
00090       nMolecule_ = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00091       if (nMolecule_ <= 0)
00092          UTIL_THROW("nMolecule_ <= 0");
00093       accumulator_.setNEnsemble(nMolecule_);
00094 
00095       accumulator_.clear();
00096 
00097       // Store initial positions, and set initial shift vectors.
00098       Vector r;
00099       for (int i = 0; i < nMolecule_; ++i) {
00100          r = system().molecule(speciesId_, i).atom(0).position();
00101          system().boundary().shift(r);
00102          oldPositions_[i] = r;
00103          shifts_[i] = IntVector(0);
00104       }
00105 
00106    }
00107 
00108    /*
00109    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00110    */
00111    void ComMSD::sample(long iStep) 
00112    { 
00113       if (!isAtInterval(iStep)) return;
00114 
00115       // Confirm that nMolecule has remained constant, and nMolecule > 0.
00116       if (nMolecule_ <= 0) {
00117          UTIL_THROW("nMolecule <= 0");
00118       }
00119       if (nMolecule_ != system().nMolecule(speciesId_)) {
00120          UTIL_THROW("Number of molecules has changed.");
00121       }
00122 
00123       Vector     r;
00124       IntVector  shift;
00125       Vector     lengths = system().boundary().lengths();
00126       int        i, j;
00127       for (i = 0; i < nMolecule_; ++i) {
00128 
00129          r = system().molecule(speciesId_, i).atom(0).position();
00130          system().boundary().shift(r);
00131 
00132          // Compare current r to previous position, oldPositions_[i]
00133          system().boundary().distanceSq(r, oldPositions_[i], shift);
00134 
00135          // If atom 0 crossed a boundary, increment its shift vector
00136          shifts_[i] += shift;
00137 
00138          // Store current position in box for comparison to next one
00139          oldPositions_[i] = r;
00140  
00141          // Add the other particle's positions to C.O.M.
00142          moleculeCom(i, r);
00143 
00144          // Reconstruct true position
00145          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00146             truePositions_[i][j] = r[j] + double(shifts_[i][j])*lengths[j];
00147          }
00148  
00149       }
00150       accumulator_.sample(truePositions_);
00151 
00152    }
00153 
00154    /*
00155    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00156    */
00157    void ComMSD::output() 
00158    {  
00159 
00160       // Echo parameter to diagnostic log file
00161       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00162       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00163       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00164       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00165       outputFile_ << "nMolecule      " << accumulator_.nEnsemble() << std::endl;
00166       outputFile_ << "bufferCapacity " << accumulator_.bufferCapacity() 
00167                   << std::endl;
00168       outputFile_ << "nSample        " << accumulator_.nSample()   << std::endl;
00169       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00170       outputFile_ << "Format of *.dat file:" << std::endl;
00171       outputFile_ << "[i]  [MSD]"
00172                   << std::endl;
00173       outputFile_.close();
00174 
00175       // Output statistical analysis to separate data file
00176       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00177       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00178       outputFile_.close();
00179    }
00180 
00181    /*
00182    * Evaluate center of mass of a single molecule, given a starting vector R0.
00183    */
00184    void ComMSD::moleculeCom(int iMol, Vector &R0)
00185    {
00186       Vector R = R0, r1, r2, dr;
00187 
00188       // Assuming a linear chain (including Ring molecules).
00189       for (int i = 1; i < nAtom_-1; ++i) {
00190          r1 = system().molecule(speciesId_, iMol).atom(i-1).position();
00191          r2 = system().molecule(speciesId_, iMol).atom(i).position();
00192          system().boundary().distanceSq(r2, r1, dr);
00193          R  += dr;
00194          R0 += R;
00195       }
00196 
00197       // Do the average.
00198       R0 /= double(nAtom_);
00199    }

00204    void ComMSD::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00205    { ar & *this; }
00206 
00207    /*
00208    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00209    */
00210    void ComMSD::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00211    { ar & *this; }
